#summary The dsw:Token Class

= The dsw:Token Class =

*See [TokenIssues this page] for discussion of issues relating to tokens.*

==Object properties defined in the darwin-sw ontology==

 * *evidenceFor* range [ClassOccurrence Occurrence]
 * *isBasisForId* range [ClassIdentification Identification]
 * *derivedFrom* range can be [ClassIndividual IndividualOrganism] or another [ClassSpecimen Specimen]
